profile.title: Senior Software Engineer
profileDescription: Senior Software Engineer with over 6 years of experience - Full stack developer - Front-end enthusiast.

Proficient in JavaScript/Typescript, React/(Next.js), and Node.js (NestJS and ExpressJS), with a strong analytical approach that transforms complex challenges into efficient applications. Open to new ideas, showing professionalism and seriousness in daily activities. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects and collaborate in a team.

timeline.jobDescription: Full Stack Developer for a British gambling company client, tasked with maintaining, enhancing, and expanding various REST API microservices applications across front-end and back-end platforms.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Frontend Development: Leveraging React and TypeScript with Vite for fast and efficient development. Implementing robust testing practices using Vitest to ensure high-quality code and maintainable applications.

Backend Development: Developing scalable and performant backend services using NestJS. Utilizing Kafka for reliable and high-throughput messaging, Cassandra for handling large-scale, distributed data storage, Redis for efficient caching to enhance application performance, and Docker for building and running container applications.
System Architecture: Designing and implementing end-to-end features, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend components.
Code Quality and Performance: Writing clean, maintainable code with a focus on performance optimization and best practices.

Collaboration and Teamwork: Working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that meet business requirements. I actively participate in code reviews, design discussions, and agile ceremonies.
Continuous Learning and Improvement: Staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve the development process and the overall quality of the applications.
Other technologies are Jira, Figma, GitHub Actions, Jest, Cypress, Stryker Mutator, Material UI, and React Admin.

timeline.jobDescription: Full Stack Developer for a media trust company client, tasked with maintaining, enhancing, and expanding various REST API microservices applications across front-end and back-end platforms.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: The main technologies are Jira, Figma, React, Next.js, Typescript, Node.js, ExpressJS, Elastic Search, Jest, Vite, Vitest, GCP (Google Functions, Google Buckets, Firebase), and Terraform.

Contributed to Continuous Improvement - Enhanced application performance by updating dependencies, reducing load time, and addressing security concerns, in line with a secure, reliable user experience.

Agile Project Management: Actively engaged in cross-functional brainstorming sessions over 3  months to identify process inefficiencies, resulting in the implementation of streamlined procedures and a 20% increase in team productivity.
Cross-functional collaboration: Worked closely with business analysts, development teams, and infrastructure specialists to architect and deliver high-availability solutions.

Code Enhancement: Utilized advanced skills to optimize and refine existing software through code enhancement, successfully eliminating coding errors and improving functionality. This led to a 25% reduction in bug reports and enhanced user experience within 3 development cycles.

Testing Proficiency: Showcased testing proficiency by executing thorough unit tests and  End-to-End (E2E) tests, guaranteeing robust software quality and superior performance. This effort contributed to a 20% reduction in post-release issues and enhanced user satisfaction within 3 months using Jest, Cypress, and Sentry.io.

UI Enhancement: Leveraged advanced tools including React, Redux, and Styled-Components to translate Figma design concepts into polished UI components,  optimizing overall system performance and user engagement.

Package Management: Over a dedicated 4-month period, expertly crafted and diligently managed an NPM package for an advanced React-based rich text editor. This endeavor substantially enriched the development landscape by simplifying and accelerating the content creation of articles, effectively reducing feature implementation time and enhancing cross-team collaboration with NPM, React, and CKEditor5.

CI/CD pipeline integration: Over 3 months, adeptly orchestrated an end-to-end CI/CD pipeline for a project encompassing both a React frontend and a microservice API built with Node.js. Seamlessly integrated code base testing, automatic deployment, and production release procedures through the Jenkins pipelines.

Technical Interviews and Mentoring: Over a couple of months, I played a role in cultivating team growth and expertise by participating in technical interviews to assess potential candidates. Additionally, as a dedicated mentor to junior developers, I facilitated knowledge transfer, providing guidance and support that led to an increase in their technical proficiency.

timeline.jobDescription: Frontend Developer for a Netherland Fintech company client, tasked with maintaining, enhancing, and expanding various REST API microservices applications across front-end.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Contributed to Continuous Improvement: Generated valuable suggestions and actively engaged in collaborative problem-solving activities to enhance team performance.
Agile Project Management: Successfully operated within an Agile-driven environment, ensuring adherence to project timelines and optimal resource utilization.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Worked closely with business analysts, development teams, and infrastructure specialists to architect and deliver high-availability solutions.
Code Enhancement: Applied advanced skills to modify and refine existing software, rectifying coding errors and enhancing functionality.
Testing Proficiency: Conducted meticulous unit tests and End-to-End (E2E) tests, ensuring robust software quality and performance.
UI Enhancement: Elevated user experience by translating provided designs into upgraded UI elements, optimizing overall system performance.
JavaScript Expertise: Adapted and customized JavaScript plugins to align with project requirements and industry best practices.
Package Management: Developed and maintained NPM packages, contributing to an efficient and modular development ecosystem.
Technology Stack Mastery: Demonstrated proficiency across a diverse range of technologies including HTML5, Tailwind CSS, NextJS, ReactJS, GraphQL, Storybook, Jest, Cypress, Git, Jira, and Jenkins.
Efficient Multitasking: Skillfully balanced multiple tasks while fostering seamless collaboration across internal and external teams.

timeline.jobDescription: Frontend Developer responsible for translating Figma designs into high-quality, responsive user interfaces.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Client Collaboration: Partnered closely with clients throughout development, ensuring seamless integration of required designs.
Agile Project Management: Thrived in an Agile-driven setting, meticulously adhering to project timelines while optimizing resource allocation.
Cross-Functional Coordination: Collaborated closely with business analysts, development teams, and infrastructure specialists, contributing to the delivery of high-availability solutions.
Code Enhancement: Skillfully rectified coding errors by modifying existing software, ensuring code base integrity and functionality.
Testing and UI Improvement: Conducted thorough unit tests, adapting interfaces to provided designs, and driving enhanced system performance.
Technologies: Expertly leveraged a technology stack including HTML5, SCSS, ReactJS, Redux, Jest, Git, Jira, and Jenkins.
